cmfd_output.F90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 module cmfd_output
00002 
00003   implicit none
00004   private
00005   public :: neutron_balance,write_cmfd_hdf5,write_cmfd_vtk
00006 
00007   integer :: nx         ! number of mesh cells in x direction
00008   integer :: ny         ! number of mesh cells in y direction
00009   integer :: nz         ! number of mesh cells in z direction
00010   integer :: ng         ! number of energy groups
00011 
00012 contains
00013 
00014 !===============================================================================
00015 ! NEUTRON_BALANCE writes a file that contains n. bal. info for all cmfd mesh
00016 !===============================================================================
00017 
00018   subroutine neutron_balance()
00019 
00020     use constants, only: ONE
00021     use global,    only: cmfd,UNIT_CMFD,keff,MAX_FILE_LEN,current_cycle
00022     use string
00023 
00024     integer :: i            ! iteration counter for x
00025     integer :: j            ! iteration counter for y
00026     integer :: k            ! iteration counter for z
00027     integer :: g            ! iteration counter for g
00028     integer :: h            ! iteration counter for outgoing groups
00029     integer :: l            ! iteration counter for leakage
00030     integer :: io_error     ! error for opening file unit
00031     real(8) :: leakage      ! leakage term in neutron balance
00032     real(8) :: interactions ! total number of interactions in balance
00033     real(8) :: scattering   ! scattering term in neutron balance
00034     real(8) :: fission      ! fission term in neutron balance
00035     real(8) :: res          ! residual of neutron balance
00036     character(MAX_FILE_LEN) :: filename
00037     character(30) :: label
00038 
00039     ! open cmfd file for output
00040 !   filename = "cmfd_"//trim(to_str(current_cycle))//".out"
00041 !   open(FILE=filename, UNIT=UNIT_CMFD, STATUS='replace', ACTION='write', &
00042 !        IOSTAT=io_error)
00043 
00044     ! extract spatial and energy indices from object
00045     nx = cmfd % indices(1)
00046     ny = cmfd % indices(2)
00047     nz = cmfd % indices(3)
00048     ng = cmfd % indices(4)
00049 
00050     ! allocate res dataspace
00051     if (.not. allocated(cmfd%resnb)) allocate(cmfd%resnb(ng,nx,ny,nz))
00052 
00053     ! begin loop around space and energy groups
00054     ZLOOP: do k = 1,nz
00055 
00056       YLOOP: do j = 1,ny
00057 
00058         XLOOP: do i = 1,nx
00059 
00060           GROUPG: do g = 1,ng
00061 
00062             ! check for active mesh
00063             if (allocated(cmfd%coremap)) then
00064               if (cmfd%coremap(i,j,k) == 99999) then
00065                 cmfd%resnb(g,i,j,k) = 99999.0
00066                 cycle
00067               end if
00068             end if
00069 
00070             ! get leakage
00071             leakage = 0.0
00072             LEAK: do l = 1,3
00073 
00074               leakage = leakage + ((cmfd % current(4*l,g,i,j,k) - &
00075              & cmfd % current(4*l-1,g,i,j,k))) - &
00076              & ((cmfd % current(4*l-2,g,i,j,k) - &
00077              & cmfd % current(4*l-3,g,i,j,k)))
00078 
00079             end do LEAK
00080 
00081             ! interactions
00082             interactions = cmfd % totalxs(g,i,j,k) * cmfd % flux(g,i,j,k)
00083 
00084             ! get scattering and fission
00085             scattering = 0.0
00086             fission = 0.0
00087             GROUPH: do h = 1,ng
00088 
00089               scattering = scattering + cmfd % scattxs(h,g,i,j,k) * &
00090              & cmfd % flux(h,i,j,k)
00091 
00092               fission = fission + cmfd % nfissxs(h,g,i,j,k) * &
00093              & cmfd % flux(h,i,j,k)
00094 
00095             end do GROUPH
00096 
00097             ! compute residual
00098             res = leakage + interactions - scattering - (ONE/keff)*fission
00099 
00100             ! normalize by flux
00101             res = res/cmfd%flux(g,i,j,k)
00102 
00103             ! bank res in cmfd object
00104             cmfd%resnb(g,i,j,k) = res
00105 
00106             ! write output
00107     !       label = "MESH (" // trim(int4_to_str(i)) // ". " // &
00108     !      & trim(int4_to_str(j)) // ", " // trim(int4_to_str(k)) // &
00109     !      & ") GROUP " // trim(int4_to_str(g))
00110     !       write(UNIT=UNIT_CMFD, FMT='(A,T35,A)') label, &
00111     !      & trim(real_to_str(res))
00112 
00113           end do GROUPG
00114 
00115         end do XLOOP
00116 
00117       end do YLOOP
00118 
00119     end do ZLOOP
00120 
00121     ! close file
00122     close(UNIT=UNIT_CMFD)
00123 
00124   end subroutine neutron_balance
00125 
00126 !===============================================================================
00127 ! WRITE_CMFD_HDF5 writes an hdf5 output file with the cmfd object for restarts
00128 !===============================================================================
00129 
00130   subroutine write_cmfd_hdf5()
00131 
00132     use global, only: cmfd,cmfd_coremap,current_cycle
00133     use string, only: to_str
00134 
00135 #ifdef HDF5
00136     use hdf5
00137     use global, only: hdf5_output_file,hdf5_err
00138 
00139 ! character(LEN=7), parameter :: filename = "cmfd.h5" ! File name
00140 !   character(LEN=4)  :: grpname = "cmfd" ! Group name
00141     character(LEN=20) :: cycname ! cycle name
00142 
00143 ! integer(HID_T) :: file_id ! File identifier
00144     integer(HID_T) :: group_id ! Group identifier
00145     integer(HID_T) :: cycle_id ! Another group id denoting cycle
00146     integer(HID_T) :: dataspace_id ! Data space identifier
00147     integer(HID_T) :: dataset_id ! Dataset identifier
00148 
00149     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1 ! vector for hdf5 dimensions
00150     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(3) :: dim3 ! vector for hdf5 dimensions
00151     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(4) :: dim4 ! vector for hdf5 dimensions
00152     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(5) :: dim5 ! vector for hdf5 dimensions
00153 
00154     ! extract spatial and energy indices from object
00155     nx = cmfd % indices(1)
00156     ny = cmfd % indices(2)
00157     nz = cmfd % indices(3)
00158     ng = cmfd % indices(4)
00159 
00160     ! get the cycle name
00161     cycname = "cycle"//trim(to_str(current_cycle))
00162 
00163     ! create the CMFD group
00164     call h5gcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname),cycle_id,hdf5_err)
00165 
00166     ! write indices from cmfd object
00167     dim1 = (/4/)
00168     call h5screate_simple_f(1,dim1,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00169     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/indices",H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,       &
00170    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00171     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,cmfd%indices,dim1,hdf5_err)
00172     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00173     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00174 
00175     ! write totalxs from cmfd object
00176     dim4 = (/ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00177     call h5screate_simple_f(4,dim4,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00178     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/totalxs",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,        &
00179    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00180     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%totalxs,dim4,hdf5_err)
00181     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00182     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00183 
00184     ! write p1scattxs from cmfd object
00185     dim4 = (/ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00186     call h5screate_simple_f(4,dim4,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00187     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/p1scattxs",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,      &
00188    &                dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00189     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%p1scattxs,dim4,hdf5_err)
00190     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00191     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00192 
00193     ! write scattxs from cmfd object
00194     dim5 = (/ng,ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00195     call h5screate_simple_f(5,dim5,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00196     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/scattxs",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,        &
00197    &                dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00198     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%scattxs,dim5,hdf5_err)
00199     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00200     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00201 
00202     ! write nfissxs from cmfd object
00203     dim5 = (/ng,ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00204     call h5screate_simple_f(5,dim5,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00205     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/nfissxs",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,        &
00206    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00207     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%nfissxs,dim5,hdf5_err)
00208     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00209     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00210 
00211     ! write diffcof from cmfd object
00212     dim4 = (/ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00213     call h5screate_simple_f(4,dim4,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00214     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/diffcof",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,        &
00215    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00216     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%diffcof,dim4,hdf5_err)
00217     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00218     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00219 
00220     ! write current from cmfd object
00221     dim5 = (/12,ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00222     call h5screate_simple_f(5,dim5,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00223     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/current",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,        &
00224    &                dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00225     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%current,dim5,hdf5_err)
00226     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00227     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00228 
00229    ! write flux from cmfd object
00230     dim4 = (/ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00231     call h5screate_simple_f(4,dim4,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00232     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/flux",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,           &
00233    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00234     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%flux,dim4,hdf5_err)
00235     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00236     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00237 
00238     ! write dtilde from cmfd object
00239     dim5 = (/6,ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00240     call h5screate_simple_f(5,dim5,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00241     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/dtilde",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,         &
00242    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00243     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%dtilde,dim5,hdf5_err)
00244     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00245     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00246 
00247     ! write dhat from cmfd object
00248     dim5 = (/6,ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00249     call h5screate_simple_f(5,dim5,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00250     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/dhat",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,           &
00251    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00252     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%dhat,dim5,hdf5_err)
00253     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00254     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00255 
00256     ! write albedo from cmfd object
00257     dim1 = (/6/)
00258     call h5screate_simple_f(1,dim1,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00259     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/albedo",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,         &
00260    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00261     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%albedo,dim1,hdf5_err)
00262     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00263     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00264 
00265     ! write hxyz from cmfd object
00266     dim4 = (/3,nx,ny,nz/)
00267     call h5screate_simple_f(4,dim4,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00268     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/hxyz",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,           &
00269    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00270     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%hxyz,dim4,hdf5_err)
00271     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00272     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00273 
00274     ! write neutron balance residual information from cmfd object
00275     dim4 = (/ng,nx,ny,nz/)
00276     call h5screate_simple_f(4,dim4,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00277     call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/resnb",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,          &
00278    &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00279     call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,cmfd%resnb,dim4,hdf5_err)
00280     call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00281     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00282 
00283 
00284     ! only write the following if core map is active
00285     if (cmfd_coremap) then
00286 
00287       ! write coremap from cmfd object
00288       dim3 = (/nx,ny,nz/)
00289       call h5screate_simple_f(3,dim3,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00290       call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/coremap",H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,     &
00291      &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00292       call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,cmfd%coremap,dim3,hdf5_err)
00293       call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00294       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00295 
00296       ! write mat_dim from cmfd object
00297       dim1 = (/1/)
00298       call h5screate_simple_f(1,dim1,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00299       call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/mat_dim",H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,     &
00300      &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00301       call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,cmfd%mat_dim,dim1,hdf5_err)
00302       call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00303       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00304 
00305       ! write core map logical to true (1)
00306       dim1 = (/1/)
00307       call h5screate_simple_f(1,dim1,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00308       call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/coremap_active",                 &
00309      &                 H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00310       call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,1,dim1,hdf5_err)
00311       call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00312       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00313 
00314     else
00315 
00316       ! write core map logical to false (0)
00317       dim1 = (/1/)
00318       call h5screate_simple_f(1,dim1,dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00319       call h5dcreate_f(hdf5_output_file,trim(cycname)//"/coremap_active",                 &
00320      &                 H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,dataspace_id,dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00321       call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,0,dim1,hdf5_err)
00322       call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,hdf5_err)
00323       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,hdf5_err)
00324 
00325     end if
00326 
00327     ! close the cycle
00328     call h5gclose_f(cycle_id,hdf5_err)
00329 
00330 #endif
00331 
00332   end subroutine write_cmfd_hdf5
00333 
00334 !===============================================================================
00335 ! WRITE_CMFD_VTK outputs mesh data in vtk file for viewing
00336 !===============================================================================
00337 
00338   subroutine write_cmfd_vtk()
00339 
00340     use global,      only: cmfd,cmfd_coremap,meshes
00341     use mesh_header, only: StructuredMesh
00342     use vtk_writer
00343 
00344     integer :: i          ! x loop counter
00345     integer :: j          ! y loop counter
00346     integer :: k          ! z loop counter
00347     integer :: g          ! group counter
00348     integer :: n_idx      ! index in eigenvector
00349     real(8) :: x_m        ! -x coordinate
00350     real(8) :: x_p        ! +x coordinate
00351     real(8) :: y_m        ! -y coordinate
00352     real(8) :: y_p        ! +y coordinate
00353     real(8) :: z_m        ! -z coordinate
00354     real(8) :: z_p        ! +z coordinate
00355     real(8) :: x_uns(1:8) ! array of x points
00356     real(8) :: y_uns(1:8) ! array of y points
00357     real(8) :: z_uns(1:8) ! array of z points
00358 
00359     type(StructuredMesh), pointer :: m => null() ! pointer to mesh
00360 
00361     ! vtk specific variables
00362     integer :: E_IO              ! error code
00363     integer :: nn                ! number of nodes
00364     integer :: nc                ! number of cells
00365     integer :: con(8)            ! connectivity vector
00366     integer :: off(1:1)          ! offset, number of nodes in cell
00367     integer(1) :: cell_id(1:1)   ! cell type
00368     real(8) :: real_buffer(1:1)  ! real data buffer 8-byte
00369     character(len=40) :: varname ! name of output variable
00370     character(len=3) :: str_g    ! string for energy group #
00371 
00372     ! extract spatial and energy indices from object
00373     nx = cmfd % indices(1)
00374     ny = cmfd % indices(2)
00375     nz = cmfd % indices(3)
00376     ng = cmfd % indices(4)
00377 
00378     ! point to mesh object
00379     m => meshes(1)
00380 
00381     ! set up vtk file
00382     E_IO = VTK_INI_XML(output_format = 'ASCII', &
00383    & filename = 'cmfd_unst.vtu', &
00384    & mesh_topology = 'UnstructuredGrid')
00385 
00386     ! set vtk parameters
00387     nn = 8
00388     nc = 1
00389     con = (/0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7/)
00390     off = (/8/)
00391     cell_id = (/11/)
00392 
00393     ! begin loop to construct mesh
00394     ZLOOP: do k = 1,nz
00395 
00396       YLOOP: do j = 1,ny
00397 
00398         XLOOP: do i = 1,nx
00399 
00400           ! check for non accelerated region
00401           if (cmfd_coremap) then
00402             if (cmfd%coremap(i,j,k) == 99999) then
00403               cycle
00404             end if
00405           end if
00406 
00407           ! calculate all coordinates
00408           x_m = dble(i - 1)*m%width(1) + m%lower_left(1)
00409           x_p = dble(i)*m%width(1) + m%lower_left(1)
00410           y_m = dble(j - 1)*m%width(2) + m%lower_left(2)
00411           y_p = dble(j)*m%width(2) + m%lower_left(2)
00412           z_m = dble(k - 1)*m%width(3) + m%lower_left(3)
00413           z_p = dble(k)*m%width(3) + m%lower_left(3)
00414 
00415           ! set up points arrays
00416           x_uns = (/x_m,x_p,x_m,x_p,x_m,x_p,x_m,x_p/)
00417           y_uns = (/y_m,y_m,y_p,y_p,y_m,y_m,y_p,y_p/)
00418           z_uns = (/z_m,z_m,z_m,z_m,z_p,z_p,z_p,z_p/)
00419 
00420           ! set up geometry piece
00421           E_IO = VTK_GEO_XML(nn,nc,x_uns,y_uns,z_uns)
00422 
00423           ! open data block in vtk file
00424           E_IO = VTK_DAT_XML('cell','open')
00425 
00426           ! loop around energy
00427           GROUP: do g = 1,ng
00428 
00429             ! convert group int to str
00430             write(str_g,'(I3)') g
00431 
00432             ! write out flux
00433             n_idx = get_matrix_idx(g,i,j,k)
00434             real_buffer = (/cmfd%phi(n_idx)/)
00435             varname = 'flux_'//trim(adjustl(str_g))
00436             E_IO = VTK_VAR_XML(nc,varname,real_buffer)
00437 
00438           end do GROUP
00439 
00440           ! close data block in vtk file
00441           E_IO = VTK_DAT_XML('cell','close')
00442           
00443           ! write out connectivity
00444           E_IO = VTK_CON_XML(nc,con,off,cell_id)
00445 
00446           ! close geometry piece
00447           E_IO = VTK_GEO_XML()
00448 
00449         end do XLOOP
00450 
00451       end do YLOOP
00452 
00453     end do ZLOOP
00454 
00455     ! close vtk file
00456     E_IO = VTK_END_XML()
00457 
00458   end subroutine write_cmfd_vtk
00459 
00460 !===============================================================================
00461 ! GET_MATRIX_IDX takes (x,y,z,g) indices and computes location in matrix 
00462 !===============================================================================
00463 
00464   function get_matrix_idx(g,i,j,k)
00465 
00466     use global, only: cmfd,cmfd_coremap
00467 
00468     ! arguments
00469     integer :: get_matrix_idx  ! the index location in matrix
00470     integer :: i               ! current x index
00471     integer :: j               ! current y index
00472     integer :: k               ! current z index
00473     integer :: g               ! current group index
00474 
00475     ! local variables
00476     integer :: nidx            ! index in matrix
00477 
00478     ! check if coremap is used
00479     if (cmfd_coremap) then
00480 
00481       ! get idx from core map
00482       nidx = ng*(cmfd % coremap(i,j,k)) - (ng - g)
00483 
00484     else
00485 
00486       ! compute index
00487       nidx = g + ng*(i - 1) + ng*nx*(j - 1) + ng*nx*ny*(k - 1)
00488 
00489     end if
00490 
00491     ! record value to function
00492     get_matrix_idx = nidx
00493 
00494   end function get_matrix_idx
00495 
00496 end module cmfd_output
Generated on Mon Feb 20 2012 20:20:05 for CMFD by  1.7.3
